trans-unit.source: Generates a random password.
trans-unit.target: 生成随机密码。

trans-unit.source: A random password.
trans-unit.target: 随机密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GeneratePassword%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to retrieve a random password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GeneratePassword%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>类调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>类检索一个随机密码。

trans-unit.source: The password length is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 密码长度设置为值<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The password length can never be less than 14.
trans-unit.target: 密码长度不能小于 14。

trans-unit.source: You can specifically call the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A> method by referencing the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class directly from the Provider property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以明确调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A>方法通过引用<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>直接从提供程序属性的类<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>类。

trans-unit.source: The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: !@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?.
No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password.
trans-unit.target: 生成的密码中包含没有隐藏或非可打印的控制字符。

trans-unit.source: The generated password will contain at least the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 生成的密码将包含至少中指定的非字母数字字符数<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The generated password will not be tested with the regular expression in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 生成的密码不到测试中的正则表达式<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class does not generate passwords that match complexity requirements set in the directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>类不会生成匹配的目录中设置的复杂性要求的密码。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to generate a random password that fails the password complexity rules set by the directory.
trans-unit.target: 就可以生成失败设置目录的密码复杂性规则的随机密码。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的结果页的索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 是从零开始的。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的结果页的大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the total number of records returned in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，此参数包含在集合中返回的记录的总数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the users stored in an Active Directory data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Active Directory 数据源中存储的所有用户的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> containing <paramref name="pageSize" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> instances beginning at the page specified by <paramref name="pageIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />，其中包含从 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 所指定的页开始的 <paramref name="pageIndex" /> <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to retrieve user information from the Active Directory data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中指定的 Active Directory 数据存储中检索用户信息。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> method are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>方法受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter specifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> instances to return in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`参数指定的最大数目<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>实例以返回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter specifies which page of results to return, where 0 (zero) indicates the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`参数指定的结果返回，其中 0 （零） 指示的第一页的页。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`参数是`out`在 Active Directory 数据存储区中找到匹配的成员资格用户的总数设置的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with la `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的数据存储中，与`pageIndex`值为 1，la`pageSize`为 5，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>返回将包含到 10 个用户的第六个。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。

The user name is mapped to the <see langword="userPrincipalName" /> attribute and the <paramref name="username" /> parameter contains backslashes.
trans-unit.target: 用户名映射到 <see langword="userPrincipalName" /> 特性，并且 <paramref name="username" /> 参数包含反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="username" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method is called before the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider" /> instance is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化 <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser(System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 实例前，调用了 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The email address to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name associated with the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定电子邮件地址关联的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: 与指定电子邮件地址关联的用户名。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class to retrieve a user name from the Active Directory data store based on the email address for the user.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>类从 Active Directory 数据存储检索的用户名称基于用户的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: If more than one user in the membership data store has the same email address, the first user name encountered is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格数据存储区中的多个用户具有相同的电子邮件地址，则返回遇到的第一个用户名。

trans-unit.source: You can set the `requiresUniqueEmail` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element to `true` in the application configuration file to ensure that each email address in the database is unique.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置`requiresUniqueEmail`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素`true`在应用程序配置文件，以确保每封电子邮件地址在数据库中的是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `email` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 删除 `email` 参数值的前导和尾随空格。

trans-unit.source: If the email address is empty after trimming, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果修整后, 的电子邮件地址为空<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If the email address is `null`, all user names in the Active Directory data store are searched, and the first user name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果电子邮件地址为`null`，搜索 Active Directory 数据存储区中的所有用户名称，并返回第一个用户名。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你不要启用搜索在生产系统上，直到您已确认的搜索查询签发<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>类不会产生负面影响你的目录服务器的性能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUserNameByEmail%2A> method will run even when the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.EnableSearchMethods%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUserNameByEmail%2A>方法将运行，即使<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.EnableSearchMethods%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 由于<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>类旨在用于无状态 Web 环境，则你无法使用公开基础的分页优化<xref:System.DirectoryServices>Api。

trans-unit.source: This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。

trans-unit.source: Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain.
trans-unit.target: 搜索操作始终发出针对配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选择的服务器中。

trans-unit.source: The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods.
trans-unit.target: 用于其搜索方法，该提供程序不使用全局编录。

trans-unit.source: The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序使用连接字符串中指定的搜索点启动的子树搜索。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class topic for more information about connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>有关连接字符串的详细信息的类主题。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="email" /> exceeds 256 characters
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="email" /> 的长度超过 256 个字符

after trimming, <paramref name="email" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 修整后，<paramref name="email" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: More than one user exists in the data store with the same email address and the <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail" /> property value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 数据存储区中存在多个具有相同电子邮件地址的用户，而 <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail" /> 属性值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.target: 该提供程序未初始化。

trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider" /> 实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> containing the names and values of the configuration options for the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 包含名称和值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，这些名称和值用于成员资格提供程序的配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider" /> instance with the property values from the application's configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 使用应用程序配置文件中的属性值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应在您的代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> object with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application configuration file (Web.config) and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法初始化<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>对象的属性值指定在 ASP.NET 应用程序配置文件 (Web.config) 中，并且不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="config" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="config" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="applicationName" /> attribute specified in the application configuration exceeds 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序配置中指定的 <see langword="applicationName" /> 特性超过 256 个字符。

The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute is empty or does not exist in the application configuration.

The connection string specified in the <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute in the application configuration file is empty or does not exist.

The <see langword="connectionProtection" /> attribute is set to a value other than <see cref="F:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection.SignAndSeal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection.None" /> in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序配置文件中，<see langword="connectionProtection" /> 特性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection.SignAndSeal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection.None" /> 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="connectionUsername" /> attribute is specified in the application configuration file but its value is empty.

The <see langword="clientSearchTimeout" /> attribute is specified but is not a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="clientSearchTimeout" /> 特性，但它不是正整数。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="serverSearchTimeout" /> attribute is specified but is not a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="serverSearchTimeout" /> 特性，但它不是正整数。

The <see langword="enableSearchMethods" /> attribute is specified, but is not a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="enableSearchMethods" /> 特性，但它不是布尔值。

The <see langword="requiresUniqueEmail" /> attribute is specified, but is not a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="requiresUniqueEmail" /> 特性，但它不是布尔值。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="enablePasswordReset" /> attribute is specified, but is not a Boolean value.

The <see langword="requiresQuestionAndAnswer" /> attribute is specified, but is not a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="requiresQuestionAndAnswer" /> 特性，但它不是布尔值。

The <see langword="minRequiredPasswordLength" /> attribute is specified and it is either negative or greater than 128.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="minRequiredPasswordLength" /> 特性，但它为负或大于 128。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters" /> attribute is specified and it is either negative or greater than 128.

The regular expression specified in the <see langword="passwordStrengthRegularExpression" /> attribute in the application configuration file is not a valid regular expression

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="attributeMapUsername" /> attribute is specified, but it is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 指定了 <see langword="attributeMapUsername" /> 特性，但它是一个空字符串。

The <see langword="connectionString" /> attribute does not begin with "LDAP".
